1.content: Who will you follow at first ?
1.title: Start

choices: Kate finds some shrunken people on the island
Some of the passengers are shrunk
She finds a way to shrunk anyone she wants to
11.content: What's the kind of story ?
11.title: Kate Austen

112.content:
The plan has crashed since some hours, and Kate finds herself trapped in some tree branches, but she was alive, and more than that, she was freed from her hancuffs. She couldn't exactly remember what happenned, but for now all mattered was that she was alive, free and on an island probably. She could hear the noises of the crashed plan not so far from her, maybe she was not the only one to have survive. She wasn't sure sure about what to do, try to help the other was probably the only thing to do, she didn't want to be alone after all. But what if the US Marshall Edward Mars has survived to ? the one who arrested her and brought her in that plane .
Anyway for now Kate decided to reach the ground, and climbed down the tree carefully.

------------------------------


On the meantime, a group of few passengers jus woke up and helped each other, but the whole environnement they where in was so big, they couldn't believe that it was real, it was like they landed into a kind of giant Island. Many of them were scared, and due to the confusion, one of them decided to be in charge of the group.

" Listen to me, we'll figure out where we are, but for now i'm asking you to remain calm. We have survived and we will continue to survive as long as we stay together "

Who's the personn talking ?
112.title: Some of the passengers are shrunk

14.content: What will be your choice ?
14.title: Claire Littleton

choices: Climb on her for a better look
141.content:
It was a sunny day on the island, like almost every day to be honest. But Claire couldn't do anything more than taking a sunbath at the beach, thought that she tried to help the camp by her way. Being pregnant didn't mean she was useless, and she intented to prove it. But today, there were nothing she could really do. So she took a nap at the beach, when something's strange happenned : she felt like a presence all around her. It was not her companions, it was something different, she couldn't tell.

On the meantime, a man being too curious about the "giant visitors" coming from the sky was walking around a giant blonde and pregnant woman. His friends warned him to not approach any giant, but it was useless. And now he looked at a giant beautiful woman sleeping on the sand, wondering what to do.
141.title: Claire (pregnant) finds some tiny people

choices: She hears some whispers, but different than usual. it sounds so SMALL
Someone stops Claire to come with her
142.content:
It was another sunday at the beach, which almost looked like some vacations since the day flight oceanic 815 crashed. Claire couldn't remember how many days, weeks are months they were here with no one to rescue them. Her life for now was here, with all the survivors and Aaron her son.
But these was not vacations, mostly when you have a black smoke monster into the Jingle, or the "Others", some people living on the island, who were hostiles.

" Hey Charlie ! " Claire headed to her closest friend among the survivors with her baby in her arms. "i was wondering if you can take care of Aaron for a while.

" Sure i can help ! let me take him " Charlie replied always excited to help Claire. " Is there something's wrong ? " he asked while hugging the boy in his own arm.

" I think, i just need to be alone for a moment, i mean, i'm taking care everyday of Aaron, i don't get anytime for me "

" Ooh ! You know i can come with you, i'll have Aaron with me you'll don't need to..." Charlie stopped, as he realized that Claire just said she needed some free times. " Just don't get too far ok ? "

" Yeah. Thank you Charlie. And please don't tell Jack "

" No problem and if you have any problem just scream and i'll come "

Claire nodded and left Charlie and Aaron together. She started to walk all along the beach, barefoot on the water. She didn't want to go into the jingle anyway. She began to think about her life, how it was before and how it will be after, if there's "an after", when...
142.title: Claire finds some tiny people

info.brief_description: The Oceanic flight 815 survivors discovers some tinies people on the Island.
